description: Advisory build-mode guidance that never blocks normal operation; detect build mode via permissions or explicit entry

hooks.prompt: Inspect session metadata/permissions. If build mode is indicated (e.g., mode=build, build-only permissions, or /build invoked), return 'approve' with a systemMessage to follow build-mode workflow and PROACTIVELY use build-mode agents. If not build work, return 'approve' with no systemMessage.

If in build mode and this is an implementation file (not a test/spec), return 'approve' with a systemMessage to follow TDD (write a failing test first, then implement, then refactor). Otherwise return 'approve' with no systemMessage.
